entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , L'Assomption
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning except zero over northern sections.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening. Freezing rain over northern sections. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning except zero over northern sections. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to a few flurries in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
